result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Donald E McDuffie
Current: 505 N 6th St Apt B3, Wausau, WI 54403 United States  (Effective: 08-14-2017)
Prior: 281 Grand Av Lot C2, Schofield, WI 54476

Case called:  1:23 pm  
Clerk: Kim H.
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo.  Defendant appears with Atty Keith Ellison.  Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. State moves to DRI 15CF380, 14CF935 entire file, 14CM495 and counts 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 9, & 10 in 14CF577.  Atty Ellison requests monitor in lieu of jail, probation be transferred out of state, and also states defendant is on SSI.
PLEA: Count 1 - Manf./Del. drugs>> Guilty
Count 5 - Manf./Del. drugs>> Guilty
Count 7 - Poss. of THC>> Guilty
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  
ADA Mayo addresses Court.  Atty Ellison makes argument.  Defendant addresses Court.
COURT ORDERS: 14CF577 >> Felony - SWH 3 years Probation.  Misd. - SWH 1 year Probation.  Concurrent with each other.  Conditions:  Count 1 only 120 days jail, stay 30 days for rules violations;  On all counts >> any assessment, treatment or counseling deemed appropriate, absolute sobriety from drug and alcohol, with the exception of prescribed medication, only to be used in manner as prescribed and authorized by agent, FTE or FTS or combo, if not, 10 hrs CS, court costs, repay buy money in the amount of $110.00, DNA sample,  and credit 3 days.  Atty Ellison to file stipulation on jail credit. COURT allows defendant on monitor if under jail qualifications, starts no later than 45 days from today's date, and may transfer out of state.
Adj:  1:49 pm
